p: Viral RNA was extracted with the MagnaNApure compact system (Roche, Penzberg, Germany) using 200 μL of the viral transport medium sample and eluted in 50 μL of elution buffer. Screening for MERS-CoV was done in accordance with the WHO interim guidelines for laboratory testing for MERS-CoV case definition, with RT-PCR assays targeting two different genomic targets (the upE region in the E gene and open reading frame [ORF1A] in the ORF1a gene) as described before. 14, 15
